items.title: Charles M. Schulz — Sonoma County Airport Receives ACI Airport Health Accreditation
items.summary: Airports Council International (ACI) has recognized Charles M. Schulz-Sonoma County Airport with its Airport Health Accreditation for prioritizing health and safety measures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tags: Charles M. Schulz — Sonoma County Airport

items.title: Santa Rosa annual Veterans Day event moves outdoors this year
items.summary: Santa Rosa’s annual Veterans Day celebration will take place Wednesday, November 11, 2020  beginning at 11 a.m. But, for the first time, the event will be held outdoors in order to assure safety during this time of COVID-19

items.title: Evento anual del Día de los Veteranos en Santa Rosa a realizarse al aire libre este año
items.summary: La celebración anual del Día de los Veteranos en Santa Rosa se llevará a  cabo el miércoles 11 de noviembre 2020, a partir de las 11 a.m. Pero  por primera vez, el evento se realizará al aire libre, para garantizar  la protección    durante estos tiempos de COVID-19.

items.title: Sonoma County health officials issue Freeze Warning & Frost Advisory
items.summary: The County of Sonoma is issuing a freeze warning and frost advisory in response to the National Weather Service’s prediction for freezing overnight lows expected through Tuesday morning at 9 a.m

items.title: Sonoma County joins health officials from ten Bay Area counties in issuing recommendations for safer holidays and travel
items.summary: The Sonoma County Department of Health Services today joined health officers from the counties of Alameda, Contra Costa, Marin, San Mateo, San Francisco, Santa Clara, Santa Cruz and the city of Berkeley in issuing joint recommendations for staying safe during the holidays.

items.title: Fire Debris Removal Training for Contractors and Debris Haulers
items.summary: Sonoma County Environmental Health and the City of Santa Rosa, in partnership with CalRecycle and California Office of Emergency Services, will hold a virtual webinar training on Fire Debris Removal for contractors and waste haulers on Monday, November 16, 2020 from 3 p.m. to 5 p.m.

items.title: Housing and Renter Support during COVID-19
items.summary: There are local resources for both renters and homeowners available in Sonoma County. To learn more about these resources visit Housing & Renter Support

items.title: Shaded fuel break to be constructed in Sonoma Valley Regional Park
items.summary: On Wednesday, Nov. 11, Sonoma County Regional Parks will begin construction of a shaded fuel break in Sonoma Valley Regional Park in an effort to improve forest health, promote park resiliency, and modulate the severity of future wildfires.
